website_summaries.verdict: One of the better action cam options available, the iON Air Pro 2 improves on the original, while still offering a good value.
pros: The iON Air Pro 2 is a simple-to-operate 1080p action cam that's waterproof without needing a housing
has very good video quality and battery life
and a nice feature set and accessory options for easily adding Wi-Fi, an extra battery, or wireless remote control
cons: The camera's audio quality isn't great (though there is an external mic jack if needed)
only one adhesive helmet mount is included
and its Android app is currently a work in progress

customer_reviews.title: Great image on the shadows and fits anywhere. Not good underwater.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, Great quality of the image and easy to fit anywhere. Very good on the shadows, better than other famous brands so for motorcycling or biking works better as it usually in this sports it points to the ground instead of the sky. It would be the best camera around if it has a replaceable battery, but apart from that, it is the best for me. That said, the charging port starts to get loose because of the repeated recharging on camera. Not so good quality image underwater.
customer_reviews.author: carlos ivan echavarria

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson and he loves it. I was a little concerned since it does not have a viewfinder, but he has made some good videos so far with it. The WIFI adapter is great for framing a shot before filming with his iPhone. Also connects easily to a laptop via Included USB cable. Very good quality, and he can use any accessories that work with a standard camera screw-attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Bowerman

customer_reviews.title: The picture quality is really good. 1080 @ 30fps is more than enough for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this camera several times now. I have had it mounted on top of my motorcycle helmet and I have mounted it on the handlebars of my motorcycle. The picture quality is really good. 1080 @ 30fps is more than enough for posting videos on YouTube or Facebook. The stability of the video is way better than I could have expected as well. For a cheap alternative to a GoPro this is your choice!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Smiddy

customer_reviews.title: The video is good, used it for Softball and Soccer
customer_reviews.text: The video is good, used it for Softball and Soccer. When I recieved it the threading at the bottom of the camera was worn out or skipped a thread and none of the extras (helmet bracket, tripod, dashcam bracket will screw in. I had to re-thread it myself. It is small and lightweight which is awesome and the phone app help a lot. The pic is from a 7:30pm game and the camera is sitting on the towards the floor near the dugout. It does capture everything. The lighting is actually really good when the sun is in the right spot. :)
customer_reviews.author: Maira P.

customer_reviews.title: i reliable
customer_reviews.text: it is cheap i mean its built well but most of the times its i reliable some times it just dont wants to turn on some times it turns on and then after few minutes turns of and you think it is recording but its not... and it happens all the time it disappointed me so many times that i will sale both of my ions and buy something else
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: (-1 star for poor tape) after about two weeks into owning it
customer_reviews.text: Mounting tape fell off, along with the camera, (-1 star for poor tape) after about two weeks into owning it. Very sad the camera is gone now. It is very good quality although the wifi app is garbage to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: wchiang

customer_reviews.title: iON Camera 1023 Air Pro 2 Wi-Fi
customer_reviews.text: Works well, I don't like the fish eyed affect... May switch out for another camera. Too bad they don't have interchangeable lens...
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: took good viseo while it worked
customer_reviews.text: it worked about 15 minutes, then the seal leaked and ruined the camera. took good viseo while it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Customer Joe

customer_reviews.title: This has proved to be excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: This has proved to be excellent value for money. The Wi-Fi is a bit painful to sync with my Samsung S5 but it got there in the end. Footage is great and sound was clear albeit suffering from some wind noise created by high speed mountain biking. The external mike may resolve that?? The actual camera and mounting systems have so far proved to be tough, stable and water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far videos are crisp and clear. A lot ...
customer_reviews.text: So far videos are crisp and clear. A lot of wind noise on my motorcycle with built in microphone, but that was to be expected. We will see how it is over the long haul.
customer_reviews.author: Vadarman

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant action cam
customer_reviews.text: I hated the go pro type with poor aerodynamics and the need for a case. This cam has worked flawlessly and produces great result. The stabilisation is not that great but good enough. Battery lasts for about 90 min of video @720p. Very hard to maintain the front glass though.
customer_reviews.author: Arun Stephen

customer_reviews.title: The best!! I have it on Motorcycle
customer_reviews.text: The best!! I have it on Motorcycle. great video quality, better than go pro. easy operation. water proof out of box nothing extra to buy like go pro, come with wi fi nothing extra to buy
customer_reviews.author: W. Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love it, 30' wateeproof, 720p 60 and 30 fps, and 1080p 30fps. No polaroid lenses built in but I guess there are filters you can get if you need to.
customer_reviews.author: James Obrian

customer_reviews.title: Customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a great unit and Buy . I would do business with this company any time .

customer_reviews.title: Awesome helmet cam
customer_reviews.text: Works great attached to the helmet. you will need to purchase an external mic that sits inside your helmet though as the wind is too loud without one
customer_reviews.author: John Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Cool cam low price
customer_reviews.text: Does what I wanted it for .Has nice video quality like the Fack it shoot a hi and mid quality video at the same
customer_reviews.author: Poormans Bushcraft

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken, power supply bad per Ion and they still wanted me to pay for return shipping. Oh and by the way, Ion is BANKRUPT. Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Matt S

customer_reviews.title: Good Dashcam, Low Variety of Mounts
customer_reviews.text: Really should've come with a better variety of mounts but still gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Action Camera
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully designed, rugged, simple to operate. You can't ask for more. But ION provides much more with its WIFI module that lets you control camera settings and see what the camera is seeing remotely through your mobile device. I wish they offered even more mounting options. But there is a standard 1/4" x 20 threaded attachment point under the camera (unlike the GoPro cameras) so you can design or create your own mounts. And in a side-by-side comparison with GoPro, I find the video to be brighter, have more colors and clarity, and just look better overall.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl R. Hedges

customer_reviews.title: works fine, havent tested it in the water because all ...
customer_reviews.text: works fine, havent tested it in the water because all of the reviews saying it gets wet inside... dont want to take the chance.
customer_reviews.author: gabriel pino

customer_reviews.title: NOT NECESSARILY WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I have owned and it broke because of the flimsy o-ring again allowing water to get in.
customer_reviews.author: Adam J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Other than the WiFi function not being protected of the elements, this can is top notch for the price

customer_reviews.title: Like a Go Pro but better
customer_reviews.text: Great quality video, easy to use. Perfect for video taping your kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy C

customer_reviews.title: GoPro Killer
customer_reviews.text: Tough, long lasting battery, and clear video. Love the wifi podz video stream and transfer.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Computer and cell phone will not recognize the camera, web site is down.??????

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Night time quality is poor Air pro lites are better
customer_reviews.author: DON

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME CAMERA, GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME CAMERA , GREAT PRICE ,, AMAZON YOU GUY,S ARE AWESOME...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sport camera honest fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice awesome product for the money good quality fast timely shipping . I received exactly what was listed and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Cromwell

customer_reviews.title: I wish it was just a little more user friendly for the techno-dummy I am....
customer_reviews.text: Great video! Awesome resolution. Would have been 5 stars if it was a little easier to run. Im not techno-savvy as some of the younger crowd, so it took me a bit to figure out how to run the wifi, but once its recording the video is really clear and steady. I use it to record riding a 4 wheeler, and it keeps things amazingly steady. The way its built keeps it plenty waterproof for my needs, and it has taken a couple of crashes in stride...
customer_reviews.author: Dan B.

customer_reviews.title: I have no idea why it suddenly get broken like this. it looks it just past the 30 ...
customer_reviews.text: after few times of use, right now I can't turn it on after a recharge. I never used it underwater or drop it or break it, I have no idea why it suddenly get broken like this. it looks it just past the 30 days return time, i can't return or replace it now. Geez!!!! Waiting to talk with the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Bing

customer_reviews.title: Had to resort to youtube and some nice kid from New York who got his Ion from ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the most user friendly device that I have used. Documentation, and software were hard to find, difficult to install. Had to resort to youtube and some nice kid from New York who got his Ion from a guy that couldn't make it work. The kid traded a skateboard for the Ion.
customer_reviews.author: ECMECC Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I was originally looking at a Go Pro. This camera has excellent picture and is smaller than the Go Pro. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: great camera at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes AMAZING videos. It's easy to use and for the price you can't beat it. The only knocks against it would be that the sometimes the quality of the pictures you take come out really fuzzy. Also, the under water video comes out really blurry too. Other than that it's a great product. I highly recommend getting it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Really sucks you can only view through wifi but you lose other controls.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: On top of the great battery life
customer_reviews.text: I have recorded roughly 4 hours of video over the span of 5 different days of recording and have yet to charge it. This is without using the wifi of course. On top of the great battery life, the picture quality is awesome. Definitely worth buying this, than a much more expensice GoPro.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ion camera is a great, with a couple of minor flaws...
customer_reviews.text: When camera is rotated 90 deg or 270 deg from vert, the HD video frame is vertical instead of horizontal. The ball mount that is double stick taped to the helmet is a bit too tall. Other than that, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Soo

customer_reviews.title: It malfunctions and the andriod software is terrible
customer_reviews.text: I only got this for it's price but if went back in time i dont think i'd buy it again. It malfunctions and the andriod software is terrible
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great movies. I used it from bikes to drone footage.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Total Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this due to past great reviews and looking for a budget GoPro..... immediately returned it and spent twice for the name brand. There are numerous great reviews on this, and I believe them, but dig deeper it seems iON essentially destroyed these with a firmware update that went poorly.... with no sign of ever addressing it. Stay away unless you enjoy it not working on wifi, needing to be hard reset multiple times to simply charge it let alone get videos onto a computer etc.... shame as I wanted to support the underdog and prefer their design over go pro for a bike helmet cam, but it bit me. I'd give it 0 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Waltor

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Camera came DOA. Had high hopes coming from a Gopro. It may have worked ok, but it never turned on. Followed charging directions to the letter, to no success. Sent it back, very disappointing experience.
customer_reviews.author: Doug A. Wilt

customer_reviews.title: it's excellent but everything else is terrible
customer_reviews.text: As far as video quality, it's excellent but everything else is terrible. Upgrading the firmware to get my microphone working was impossible (ended up returning the camera) the software for the camera didn't work, it didn't read my camera so I couldn't upgrade the firmware. Their website sucked and didn't help. They said you need an SD card of class 10 or higher for the software to read the camera. I got one, still didn't work. The hassle this comes with isn't worth it. I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: gina scoles

product_meta.title: iON Camera 1023 Air Pro 2 Wi-Fi,Black/Blue
product_meta.description: The Air Pro 2 is the second generation of our iON Air Pro series. The camera has a 14MP sensor and 180-degree field of view. When you add in its ability to attach an external microphone (not waterproof), ultra-light weight of 130grams/4.6oz and 2.5 hour battery life, it’s a no-brainer.
feature_bullets: With a 180 degree field of view, record videos in outstanding 1080p and 720p, and record audio with a built-in high quality microphone. Capture 14PM still, burst-shot, and time lapse images.
The iON Air Pro Camera is extremely durable and waterproof WITHOUT a case up to 10 meters/30 feet.
Storage: Micro SD/Micro SDHC minimum class 6, recommended class 10 up to 32gb (not included). Battery life: approx. 2.5 hours
Compatible with all iON Accessories and Mounts.
Wi-Fi PODZ included to enable Shoot/Share functionality allowing real time upload to social media platforms.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars116 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
